issue.title: [CF 117] Taint from WorldMapBlobFrame:Hide()
issue.body:
Reproduced with the latest version.

2/13 11:27:25.432  An action was blocked in combat because of taint from TellMeWhen - WorldMapDetailFrame:SetScale()
